ThingDef.label: animal eldritch flesh tentacle
ThingDef.description: An animal eldritch flesh tentacle. A fleshy, muscled tentacle resembling a partial transformation into a fleshbeast. The tentacle is excellent at manipulation and grabbing targets.

ThingDef.label: animal toughspikes
ThingDef.description: An animal implant that adds two rending claws to the animal's body, independent of their original limbs.

ThingDef.label: animal ranged trispikes
ThingDef.description: An animal implant that adds three fleshy spikes to the animal's body, independent of their original limbs. These extra limbs allow them to use a ranged attack.

ThingDef.label: animal pseudo deadlife shaper
ThingDef.description: An animal implant that produces a cloud of microscopic archites that induce a state of pseudo deadlife, granting great resilience to an animal without outright killing it. Removing the implant will deactivate the archites and return the animal to normalcy.
